snippet.title: Samurai Bringer - Pre-Launch Reveal Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Hack and slash through hordes of enemy samurai and demons to regain your lost powers in your quest to defeat Yamata-no-Orochi, the legendary eight-headed dragon of Japanese mythology.

Coming to PS4 on April 21!
